data.comment: The match is underway. Flamengo have kicked-off.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, In Salvador Flamengo attack through Everton Ribeiro. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
Flamengo take a 0-1 lead thanks to Pedro.
In the minute 4, Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Salvador.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gilberto of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 7, Bahia have a goal kick.
In Salvador Flamengo drive forward through Willian Arao. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Leo Pereira (Flamengo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Arena Fonte Nova.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Free kick Flamengo.
Flamengo's Giorgian De Arrascaeta breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Flamengo.
Bahia's Zeca gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Gilberto for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Great finish from Pedro to give Flamengo a 0-2 lead.
Giorgian De Arrascaeta instrumental with a fine assist.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bahia a goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Flamengo's area.
Flamengo's Pedro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Bahia's Rossi is whistled for offside at Arena Fonte Nova.
Flamengo's Pedro breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
In the minute 25, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Bahia throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Pedro (Flamengo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 27, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 28, In Salvador Bahia attack through Rodriguinho. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Flamengo.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 31, Rossi of Bahia is pulled up for offside.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
Rodriguinho keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
In the minute 32, Great play from Gilberto to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo move into a more comfortable 1-3 lead. Giorgian De Arrascaeta is the scorer with a header!
That's a fine assist from Mauricio Isla.
In the minute 38, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Flamengo's Pedro misses with an attempt on goal.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Elber puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-3.
In the minute 43, Throw-in Flamengo.
Flamengo drives forward and Pedro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Everton Ribeiro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
In the minute 44, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Flamengo's Pedro Rocha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Rodriguinho for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, Flamengo have a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
Bahia kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 47, Flamengo to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Flamengo extend their lead to 2-4 through Everton Ribeiro.
In the minute 48, Mauricio Isla with an assist there.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Bahia.
Elber's header is off-target for Bahia.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
Bahia needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 52, It's now 2-5 in Salvador as Giorgian De Arrascaeta scores for Flamengo.
Pedro Rocha with an assist there.
Flamengo are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 55, Mauricio Isla for Flamengo is whistled offside.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Flamengo.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Bahia.
Rodriguinho for Bahia drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Flamengo's Pedro has run offside.
In the minute 61, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Flamengo's area.
In the minute 63, Bahia pushes forward through Elber, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Flamengo's Pedro gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Pedro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Flamengo.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Flamengo make their first substitution with Diego replacing Thiago Maia.
In the minute 67, Domenec Torrent Font (Flamengo) is making a second substitution, with Michael replacing Pedro Rocha.
The home team have replaced Rossi with Marco Antonio. This is the first substitution made today by Roger Machado.
Juninho Capixaba is on a sub for Zeca for Bahia.
In the minute 69, Free kick Flamengo.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Bahia.
In Salvador Bahia attack through Elber. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Michael for Flamengo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 73, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Flamengo are coming forward and Willian Arao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Bahia.
Juninho Capixaba (Bahia) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Elton with Edson.
Jadson is replacing Rodriguinho for the home team.
The home team replace Gilberto with Saldanha.
In the minute 80, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Flamengo.
Flamengo make their third substitution with Lincoln replacing Pedro.
In the minute 82, Thuler is on a sub for Mauricio Isla for Flamengo.
Everton Ribeiro (Flamengo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Vitinho is replacing Giorgian De Arrascaeta for Flamengo at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bahia a goal kick.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Thuler is booked for the away team.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Bahia.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Bahia's Jadson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Elber (Bahia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick in a good position for Flamengo!
Savio Pereira Sampaio blows to end the match. The final score is 3-5.
Goal! Bahia reduce the deficit to 3-5 through Daniel.
Great play from Marco Antonio to set up the goal.
Flamengo's Diego has been booked in Salvador.
